theRepent:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theRepent:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theRepent:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theRepent:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theRepent:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theRepent:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theRepent:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theRepent:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theRepent:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theRepent:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theRepent:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theRepent:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theRepent:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
